name: Sega Ages: Phantasy Star Collection
overview: Sega Ages Phantasy Star Collection (SEGA AGES ファンタシースターコレクション) is a compilation of four Phantasy Star games and was released for the Sega Saturn exclusively in Japan in 1998 as part of the Sega Ages series. - Phantasy Star - Phantasy Star II: Kaerazaru Toki no Owari ni - Phantasy Star III: Toki no Keishousha - Phantasy Star: Sennenki no Owari ni
